alert.note: Alert for Green; Hart; Larue (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:53PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Green, south central Larue and northeastern Hart Counties through 530 PM EDT/430 PM CDT/... At 453 PM EDT/353 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Munfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Hart, south central Larue and northwestern Green Counties, including the following locations... Wards, Jonesville, Wabash, Bloyd, Allendale, Hudgins, Lobb, Hammonville, Powder Mill and Pike View. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
